functions.name: createAccount
functions.description: Creates a new mail account in Thunderbird with OAuth2 authentication. If the account already exists, it will not be recreated.

parameters.name: realname
parameters.description: The user's full name, displayed in the 'From' field of outgoing emails.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The display name for the account in Thunderbird's folder pane.

alreadyExists.description: True if the account already existed and was not recreated.

error.description: Error message if the operation failed.

functions.name: setToken
functions.description: Sets the OAuth2 refresh token for an existing mail account.

parameters.name: refreshToken
parameters.description: The OAuth2 refresh token for the account.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the account.

success.description: Whether the token was set successfully.

error.description: Error message if the operation failed.
